artifacts.summary: Research report analyzing current /review command structure, ROADMAP.md integration patterns, and recommendations for adding Strategies/Ambitions context loading, roadmap revision, and task suggestions output

summary: Research found /review has read-only ROADMAP integration but lacks write-back capability. Recommends extending with Step 1.5 (load Strategies/Ambitions context), Step 6.5 (revise ROADMAP based on findings), and Step 8.5 (task suggestions output like /learn). Strategies/Ambitions sections don't exist in ROAD_MAP.md yet - may require prerequisite task.
